item.title: The Programmer's Brain: What every programmer needs to know about cognition
item.description:
I found The programmer’s brain, by Felienne Hermans very interesting. The only drawback, in my opinion, was the organization of contents: I would have rearranged in a different manner because in the way I read them I felt some low cohesion. Below I won’t cite too many researchers and professors, but keep in mind that the book has all the names and the bibliographic information needed!
